description: Detect interaction patterns that may block keyboard, timing, or pointer accessibility.
recommendation: Provide keyboard alternatives, timing controls, and motion/pointer fallbacks. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.1.2,2.1.4,2.2.1,2.2.2,2.3.1,2.5.1,2.5.2,2.5.4,3.2.1,3.2.2)
algorithm: Scans for accesskey, meta refresh, timeouts, marquee/infinite animations, pointer gestures, motion APIs, keyboard traps, or focus/input-triggered navigation patterns.
algorithm_advanced: Regex-scans for accesskey, meta refresh, setTimeout/Interval, marquee/infinite/flashing animations, pointer-gesture handlers, motion APIs, keyboard-trap patterns, and onfocus/oninput navigation.
